channel.title: +नक्षत्रम् on ज्योतिषे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +नक्षत्रम् on ज्योतिषे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: तारामण्डलानि
item.description: Constellations Constellations are patterns of stars which aid in describing locations of various celestial objects. They are associated with colorful tales which motivated the ancients of various cultures - a great mnemonic (and spiritual) device! Various stars in a constellation are often identified with greek letters - like apha centauri, alpha virginis. चान्द्रनक्षत्रताराः नक्षत्रसूक्तं दृश्यताम्। तथा ऽथर्ववेद-नक्षत्र-कल्पो ऽप्य् अत्र। See also notes and references on equinoctial records. राशिताराः चान्द्र-नक्षत्रपृष्ठे राशिसूचौ दृश्यताम्।
